titles.title: Lord I Give You my Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This is my desire, to honor You Lord with all my heart I worship You All I have within me, I give You praise All that I adore is in You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord I give You my heart, I give You my soul I live for You alone Every breath that I take, every moment Iâ€™m awake Lord have Your way in me{/lang-eng}
